attributes.action: Mass vaccination similar to Election Style  voting polls.
attributes.additional_details: A robust and aggressive,mass covid vaccination, is needed to create herd immunity in shortest period of time
attributes.background: Millions of voters vote in one day, in government elections. Same principlie can be applied to mass vaccination  for millions in one day

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government has already announced it is setting up vaccination centres to ensure vaccines are administered as quickly as possible. You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/first-people-to-receive-oxford-universityastrazeneca-covid-19-vaccine-today-4-january-2021
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
